Unforgettable Special Events at Rigbyâs World
Where Middle Georgia Comes to Celebrate!
Looking for the ultimate destination for family fun, entertainment, and community excitement? Rigbyâs World in Warner Robins, GA is your go-to hub for unforgettable special events all year long. From holiday celebrations and live performances to themed nights and exclusive seasonal happenings, thereâs always something happening at Rigbyâs! Whether you're planning your visit or just donât want to miss out, our calendar is packed with fun for guests of all ages. Explore upcoming events, buy tickets, and make memories that last a lifetimeâonly at Rigbyâs!

Enjoy morning lap swimming every Weekday June 16th â September 30th
